name: Poly Path
description:
Poly Path is a game of focus and attention. Guide your little guys down the right path!

Challenge your multi-tasking skills in this fun puzzle! Route the quirky colorful dots to their correct color by tapping the track to change the turns. Play smart and focus to earn rewards! It's a simple tapping game to learn, yet difficult to master. The paths get crazy as levels get harder!

Free to download and experience the unique gameplay. A fun game for when you are bored - pick up and play to challenge your brain. No wifi or internet required for playing - play offline if you like!

• Over 100 unique, hand-crafted levels to master
• Simple yet challending, addictive gameplay
• Collect stars based on your performance
• Unlock rewards with your stars
• Clean, crisp graphics
• Cute characters to follow your path
• Simple touch controls


For similar gameplay with an animal twist, check out Animal Trail! https://goo.gl/woRqaO

[Controls]
Tap the path intersections to toggle the direction of the fork. Train your fingers and multi tasking skills to succeed!

Start your path today!

Audio by Scott Hitchon: http://www.scotthitchon.com/
